author: Patrick Reevell
title: Americans stuck as last flight out of Russia stopped on tarmac
description: Hundreds of Americans are stranded in Russia after the country suspended international flights, forcing the last flight bound for the US to cancel on tarmac
content: Hundreds of Americans are stuck in Russia after the country abruptly suspended international air traffic on Friday in response to the coronavirus epidemic, forcing the last flight bound for the U.S. to cancel its takeoff even as it was waiting on the runway.… [+6630 chars]
